name: Device of Bakudan
description:
Throw magic bombs! Destroy everything around you! Avenge your family!

◆ Hand-drawn levels that you can destroy! ◆

Make tunnels, destroy walls, use the terrain to your advantage! Every level contains terrain that can be destroyed with bombs.


◆ Elemental bombs with unique effects! ◆

There are 8 unique bomb types for the player to unlock, each with unique effects!
  • Normal Bomb: A simple explosion. Very reliable!

  • Electric Bomb: Spawns an Electric Star that zaps nearby enemies. (WARNING: Very volatile!)

  • And more! (Play the game to find them all!)

◆ Interactions and reactions between bombs (and the environment)! ◆


Most bombs can react with each other or the environment to create something new!

  • Throw an electric bomb at lava and watch it explode!
  • Make enemies shoot fireballs into an ice cloud to deal bonus damage to them!
  • And more!

Use these combinations to your advantage!

◆ Defeat powerful Elemental Bosses and the Embodiment of Chaos! ◆


Become destruction itself and unleash your explosive power on the Elemental Bosses and the Chaos Mage!










Project made for the B.A. in Interactive Product Design, B.F.A. in Animation and B.F.A. in Digital Design degrees of U-tad, University of Technology, Arts and Design.
